name: Rivet
headline: Open-source Durable Objects
description: Rivet is the platform to build realtime, edge, or agent applications. Open-source & self-hostable.

founders.name: Nicholas Kissel, Founder
founders.description: Building the open-source stateful, serverless, and scalable platform for realtime, edge, or agent applications. Previously at Paradox.ai & Addicting Games. University of Arizona.

founders.name: Nathaniel Flurry, Founder
founders.description: Building infrastructure for multiplayer experiences at Rivet. Previously at Yendis (develops Krunker.io, acquired by FRVR in May '22) and Addicting Games (acquired by Enthusiast Gaming in September '21). WWDC Scholar 2016-2018.

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Rivet**

Rivet is a forward-thinking tech company founded in 2022, hailing from the bustling heart of San Francisco's innovation scene. As part of Y Combinator Batch W23, Rivet specializes in building real-time, edge, or agent applications. Their mission centers around creating open-source, self-hostable solutions that minimize common limitations faced in app development, such as Redis constraints and Lambda timeouts.

**What Rivet Does**

Understanding Rivet's core offering is key to appreciating its market impact. The platform is designed to be scalable, stateful, and serverless, catering to the demands of modern application developers. Whether you're building game servers, AI agents, or collaborative applications, Rivet provides simple primitives that simplify backend functionality. Its unique “Rivet Actors” feature allows developers to create complex functionalities effortlessly.

Here’s a quick look at how Rivet distinguishes itself:
- **Diverse Use Cases**: From game servers and AI agents to local-first sync and Discord activities, the platform is versatile.
- **State & Persistence**: Rivet offers a memory-like state management that works seamlessly like storage, tailored for fast-paced applications.
- **Real-Time Messaging**: With lightweight messaging and complete type safety, building interactive applications becomes streamlined.
- **Fault Tolerance**: Rivet ensures resilience, so your applications maintain uptime even during crashes.

**Why Rivet Matters**

The team currently consists of five passionate employees, led by Group Partner Diana Hu. As they keep expanding their features, Rivet is not just a platform; it’s a reliable partner that promises automatic DDoS mitigation, built-in SSL security, and easy deployment options, all while ensuring zero infrastructure maintenance. Their approach enables developers to pay only for what they use, scaling from zero to millions of users with impressive ease.

**Get Involved**

The Rivet community is growing, with options for both self-hosting and cloud deployment, making it flexible. With resources like comprehensive [documentation](https://rivet.gg/docs) and ongoing support, Rivet aims to empower developers to build applications without limits.

For those interested in a demo or starting on Rivet, visit their official site at [rivet.gg](https://rivet.gg). In a world where every millisecond counts, Rivet is opening doors for developers to build and scale their applications more efficiently than ever.
